The esophagus and the esophago - gastric junction has been the most widely investigated organ so far .Esophago - gastric junction appears at OCT investigation clearly recognizable because the stomach wall shows a different OCT pattern , characterized by the presence of a vertical crypt - and - pit architecture of the mucosa that changes abruptly to the horizontal , layered tissue architecture of the esophageal squamous epithelium ( Figure 1 ) .
